text:
12/18/2025 Edit

Over the last few months, the owner of DeckMasters (Jordan Webb) has been diligent in working with us to resolve our concerns. I am very grateful for his communication and responsiveness to all of the issues we raised. Although we had communication and scheduling issues at the beginning of our project, our deck now looks fantastic, and I am confident that others will have a good experience as long as Jordan is involved.
author: Paige Smothers
